content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following trainings are a great help and will simplify your day-to-day job.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4947,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6f14a710-8e11-4b6e-99b2-449bf9fcf0ca/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6f14a710-8e11-4b6e-99b2-449bf9fcf0ca/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"6.PNG\",\"name\":\"6.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6f14a710-8e11-4b6e-99b2-449bf9fcf0ca\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":614,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/#/selfAssign/70327b23-68b1-4740-859d-be810338c2d3\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Travel and Expense Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Complete this training before youÂ click 'NEXT' button\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}}"
